pages.text: The $(item)Flux Compressor/$ converts $(thing)Forge Energy/$ (compatible with $(thing)Redstone Flux/$ and the energy systems of various other mods) into $(l:base_concepts/pressure)compressed air/$. It consumes a base 40 FE/tick, but can be upgraded with $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#speed)Speed Upgrades/$.$(p)The Flux Compressor has a capacity of 100,000 FE and accepts FE at double the rate it uses it.
Creating a $(item)Flux Compressor/$$(p)This generator must be $(l:base_concepts/heat)cooled/$, as its efficiency will drop as the temperature rises, up to the point where no air is generated at all.
